website_summaries.verdict: Nice oval-shaped mini slow cooker that has removable cooking element and is dishwasher-safe.
pros: Produces tasty side dishes and appetizers
Great for preparing morning oatmeal the night before
Easy to transport to parties and events
Comes with large band to hold down lid while traveling with unit
cons: May burn on one side of pot

customer_reviews.title: Sized for singles only?
customer_reviews.text: This crock pot is tiny! I accidentally bought this model to replace an older cracked crock pot, and didn't pay close enough attention to the size---my bad! In the attached photo I have used a standard can of peas to show how big it is: note that the upright can is actually too tall to fit completely inside the crock pot. I think this size would only be big enough for a single-person household, if using it for actual slow-cooker meals. However, it is pretty convenient for keeping queso and other hot dips warm, and for taking a small side dish to a party (it comes with a rubber band to keep the lid closed during transport).
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Had a ton of slow cookers- this one is fantastic. My biggest issue with more 'prestige' brands is ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a ton of slow cookers- this one is fantastic. My biggest issue with more 'prestige' brands is overheating and making the meat jerky-like in texture by the time you're ready to eat. I love how it makes everything tender and, dare I say, moist, even if you're an hour or two late home from a busy day. I actually took this thing out of state to make short ribs for my Grandma because the results are so awesome and I wanted to show her. Cheap, awesome, better than big brands- so don't hesitate- this came to my house completely without any cracks or shipping damage- go for it!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Excellent if you are cooking for one or two
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this slow cooker. These days, I only cook for one or two people at a time, and this one is just the right size. I suppose you could cook for up to about four, but I usually cook several meals for lunches at once. The control is simple; off, warm, low, and high. The pot is small enough to manage in the sink easily for cleaning, and the surface has not taken any stains. It does not take up a lot of storage space. It works well, is easy to maintain, and fits my needs. I am very happy with this slow cooker. E.M. Van Court
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Van Court

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and cooks perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I make oatmeal in it nightly and have a delicious, nutritious breakfast every morning. It is the perfect size for 2 meals. It is very easy to clean and takes up very little room. I especially love the rubber band that fits over the top and attaches to the handles. It keeps any steam from escaping so the food is cooked perfectly! Excellent idea! This is a great product and I'm so glad I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: artist

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slow cooker for single meal for one to two people!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to cook meals for two people. It is a perfect size for two people or for keeping dips warm at a party. Hot will cook food fast. In other words, unlike other small slow cookers-you do not need to adjust the temperature just because it is small. It is a smaller version of the same reliable Proctor Silex big slow cookers. Yes, I did burn the first meal I cooked in by assuming it would not have the power of the big slow cookers. I have cooked many meals in it. I like the oval shape for getting meat to fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and shape for many recipes. I bought this to replace a Crockpot brand who's cover broke after many years. It's comparable in quality and should also last many years. I like that it has different heat settings and a glass lid. It also has a useful cover band for transporting that I don't remember reading about in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: My secret to great apple butter
customer_reviews.text: great for simmering a large jar of applesauce with some sugar and sprice overnight or even 24 hours till thick then adding those ittle red cinnamon candies from Amazon to make homemade apple butter neighbors love it i share
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get enough of how amazing this little cooker is. While I disagree that it's easily portable, I love the fact that it's perfect for making meals for 1-2 people. As a single male, I can easily make a good stew with this cooker. For the price, don't expect anything fancy, but it does get the job done. I bought this particular one to replace another slow cooker of the exact same model, just a different color; that model was a gift and it is still going strong after 5 years. This is probably one of the best kitchen purchases I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I live alone and this seemed like the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I live alone and this seemed like the perfect size. It looks quite small, but I can easily get two meals out of one batch. I've made a small roast with potatoes and carrots, a small pork roast which I pulled apart, added BBQ sauce and let it simmer. Also great for homemade soups. I find that if I start it out on high for an hour or two and then turn it down to low, the food will cook much faster without burning. I love mine and would definitely recommend it for a household of 1 or 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Oldie but Goodie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one or two people
customer_reviews.text: Finally we are empty nesters. My big slow cooker served the family well but now we don't need to make a gallon of chili or a 6 lb pot roast so I donated the 7qt cooker and bought this. Works great for us and we don't mind not having a fridge full of leftovers that will inevitably be tossed. No bells or whistles on this one but I don't have to worry about it not resetting the cooking cycle when there's a power failure like with the digital cooker and the insert is so much lighter and easier to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dinners for two!
customer_reviews.text: Great little crock pot for two people! I have larger slow cookers, but feel like I have to make so much to adequately fill it. My daughter bought one of these for her dorm room and made unbelievable dinners for a college student (i.e. turkey meatballs and brussel sprouts). I bought mine after she recommended it and I'm glad I did! This is a standard slow cooker with multiple heat settings. The lid fits well and it has no problems heating up or cooking the food. Perfect for those who don't need to feed a large family.
customer_reviews.author: Mares

customer_reviews.title: I love this crockpot !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect crockpot for a small meal. My other crockpot, which I've used for years and years, is wonderful for a large family but this little one is a great addition to my kitchen. I've used it for homemade chicken vegetable soup and for chicken curry. Absolutely the right amount of food for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Babs Z.

customer_reviews.title: This crockpot literally STINKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this little pot 3 times, and every time my food came out having a very distinct chemical smell and flavor! I could tell that the odor came from the rubber liner on the lid. I soaked the liner all day long in soapy water, and even aired it out each time I used it!! I don't understand why other buyers didn't have this same problem!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Murray

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for one person
customer_reviews.text: I've used this regularly for about a year and have no complaints. I use the round version too. The only differences are this came with the travel band, it has a rubber seal, and the oval shape. I don't really have a preference, but I'd probably buy this one if I had to choose. It has worked great for things like cooking oatmeal overnight and heating up potatoes ahead of time. It's the perfect size for 1-2 people. This brand of crockpot seems to cook without cooking too hot.
customer_reviews.author: TH9500

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific little slow cooker for one or two people. That's good, because the larger ones seem to burn my food for two by cooking too quickly. I really like this smaller size ... more efficient and makes the food very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: luv2paint

customer_reviews.title: product was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but it was delivered in just the box as I would pick up off the shelf in a store. Not in another box to protect it. Box was very mishandled and the crockpot was scratched and fair sized dent in it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. RVO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two servings!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I LOVE slow cooker recipes but I live alone and even through I cut the recipe in half, if I use a standard size cooker the food can over cook. So I got this smaller one. It is perfect for two portions and I don't have to eat the same thing for a week or longer. The price was great! In the Fall and Winter months I will use it all the time, especially for soups.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Great little slow cooker, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I've probably used this a couple dozen times so far- love it. No complaints, does exactly what it's supposed to. I've only owned one other slow cooker before, and find this one much easier to clean. I had one boil-over but it was completely my own fault, definitely way overfilled it and then was late getting home to boot. Since then I take advantage of the small size and sit this in a baking tin when in use just in case. Outside does get very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in cord length, but love the product
customer_reviews.text: Great little cockpit. Love it with one exception, the cord is too short. When using I need to have it so close to the wall outlet, that it makes it difyto remove the lid and stir. Outlets are generally under kitchen cabinets and it doesn’t leave much room. Joyce
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an apartment or child in college
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an apartment or child in college. They can throw some chicken in the crockpot in the morning with some BBQ sauce and a can of coke, and come home to the most delicious and juicy chicken that they have ever tasted. And the leftovers will stay moist in the fridge too! Great purchase when you are cooking for just one or two people!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small cooker
customer_reviews.text: I loved my 1.5 qt. oval slow cooker. I think it is ideal for a single person or a couple. I've only used it once so far to cook boneless country ribs for pulled pork. They cooked beautifully. The oval shape really works well for fitting food without having to cut it up. If you like to cook large portions of soup, say for freezing, this will be too small. But if you want to cook no more than two to three servings (depending on what you're cooking), then this is the cooker you want. I'm going to get a lot of use out of this. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug fitting lid.
customer_reviews.text: The seal on the lid makes it fit snug enough on the crock that all moisture remains in the crock while cooking. The size of the pot is perfect for cooking for two. My favorite dish is Italian beef. Salt 1 pound stew meat then sauté it in olive oil until all moisture has evaporated. Add a little minced garlic and sauté briefly. Splash in a little red wine to deglaze the pan then add a small can of San Marzano Italian tomatoes. Place the mixture in the Proctor Silex and cook on high for 5 hours. Serve over Cavatappi pasta. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Frisco Texan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! This is SO cute!!!! We are empty nesters now, and I don't like to drag out my big crockpot unless I'm making apple butter or have kids over. This was such a reasonable price and takes up little space. There are no bells & whistles, but why do you need them? I'm thinking of getting one for my husband so he can have it at work to heat food up.
customer_reviews.author: THERESA O.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding crockpot. Love the oval shape which accommodates many different kinds of foods. The size is perfect for 1 or 2 people. (I tried a 1 qt which was just too small and did not have the temperature controls.) The lid has a soft lining which makes a good seal. Everything is very well designed and made.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little pot for individual portions
customer_reviews.text: This is one bad little hot pot. It makes nicely sized portions and works great for a single twenty something that could find a way to burn water. I am impressed at what it can do for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan s

customer_reviews.title: Great for a single person or couple
customer_reviews.text: This small crockpot is great for a single person. It allows you to make a smaller portion, just make sure to cut the recipe in at least half. The rubber band and rubber ring around the lid are very handy when transporting it to a gathering. The only thing I wish is that they made a small version like this with a timer.
customer_reviews.author: chiseptum

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a single senior, and disliked making my (favorite) slow-cooked chicken in my larger cooker. This unit is perfect! I can make two-to-three servings at a time without feeling wasteful. It stays on my counter; I use it often, and it's very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: mcab

customer_reviews.title: Helping me to get healthier
customer_reviews.text: This little slow cooker is great. I live alone, and cook for myself. I have been trying to get healthier by changing my diet and lifestyle. I find it easy to fix meals sized just for me with a minimum of hassle and a minimum of time. There are several books that I have purchased from Amazon with lots of healthy, delicious and nutritious recipes. These have helped me to stay on track with my weight loss goals. One of the books has 350 Recipes for the slow cooker, and I have used several of them recently. One little trick that can be used with any slow cooker: spray or wipe cooking oil into the ceramic to make cleanup easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oval Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great little crock pot. The oval size make it perfect for many recipes. This is my 2nd one because ya can't have enough of these.
customer_reviews.author: rocky mt lady

customer_reviews.title: Meals for two favorite crock pot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for meals for two. Easy cleanup, top and dish go into dishwasher. Silicone cord keeps top secure. My large crock pot wouldn't fit in the dishwasher and required to be hand cleaned each time. This one does not, so I'm using it more.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martell

customer_reviews.title: Reliability is the main object.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Worth paying the shipment to Australia and buying a transformer. Totally reliable, the High is not boiling and the Low is a very gentle simmer, unlike others I've previously owned. Can't buy this small size in Oz, it is perfect for singles or couples. Takes up very little space in your cupboard. I use it nearly every day for steel cut oats, soup or casseroles. 10 out of 10 from me.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Used 1 Time and Won't Work
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!!! Of course the return window closed on January 31, 2019 and I received this as a Christmas gift December 25, 2018. I used this only one time and it will not heat. I tried three different plugs and my surge protector and this cooker will not work. 1 time use and BOOM will not heat. Do not buy this sorry product.!!!!! Return windows need to last more than 30 days because sellers are making a killing on selling defective merchandise and then you can not return the product. Very sad!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size For 1 or 2 People
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived earlier than expected. Package was very well wrapped and in excellent condition. Perfect for a single person (game hen and 3lb. roast w/ apples and oranges fits nicely) Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: XxWEEDxX

customer_reviews.title: Trucker's Home Cooked Meal!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Boyfriend is an over-the-road truck driver. I prep crockpot "dump" recipes in crockpot liner bags (cinched with a secure tie) and then freeze by placing in the freezer in a ziploc bag. He takes them in his truck fridge and starts the crockpot on appropriate setting at start of his drive. Hot meal when he stops!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: i can't believe how much I like this little cooker
customer_reviews.text: i can't believe how much I like this little cooker! I've made steal cut oats overnight with great success. And I've also cooked beans and soups. The size is perfect for a small family -- It holds enough for one dinner and enough leftovers for lunch the next day. So much better than having enough leftovers to last a week!
customer_reviews.author: S. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I do not know abt durability....I haven’t had it long enough....I like the settings it has, how the lid helps seal the moisture in....I use it to cook small amounts and to make herbal and mushroom tea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were great for chocolate dipping at our 50th
customer_reviews.text: These were great for chocolate dipping at our 50th. Also the perfect size for just the 2 of us. However, one of the 2 we purchased does seem to wwork well unless it is on high or keep warm. The Med and Low settings are messed up! Other than that, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Peck Knueven

customer_reviews.title: Great little crock pot!
customer_reviews.text: I use this crock pot ALL THE TIME for making buffalo chicken dip! I also use it all the time for when I make little sausages for parties. I've had mine for years and bought this as a gift because a friend was borrowing mine so often and loved it. I like the rubber band that comes with it for keeping the lid secure...once you attach that on, the lid doesn't budge.
customer_reviews.author: Katie A.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than using the microwave to make nacho cheese
customer_reviews.text: Much better than using the microwave to make nacho cheese. Kept the cheese hot & melty all during dinner without having to run & heat it up.
customer_reviews.author: rosetully

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Slow Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I needed an small slow cooker for a long time and this filled the bill nicely because I can make small amount of food in it and not have a lot of left over food to freeze after. Yesterday I made 3 pork shops in a herbed sauce that came out super tasty in only 3-1/2 hours. Amazon has a great assortment of these small slow cookers to fill your wishes, and this is one of the best. I have 2 slow cookers but they are big and I don't want to make a big amount of food for myself. I love this slow cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Roman Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: One Person Slow Cooker
customer_reviews.text: This small slow cooker is perfect for a single person living along. I can make a meal just for one without a lot of left overs (I don't like leftovers most of the time). It cooked the food perfectly in the time allotted and then kept it warm until ready for dinner. It would also work great for a couple who don't want a lot of left overs.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: It has worked great and I have no had any problems
customer_reviews.text: I have a large Slow cooker for things such as stews and soups then I have this little guy for small dishes such as lil' smokies or small amounts of pulled pork. It has worked great and I have no had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: It cooked them beautifully--the best ever. The oats came out very creamy and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cook my steel cut oats. It cooked them beautifully--the best ever. The oats came out very creamy and soft. I cooked the oats for 4 hrs. on low. You do have to fill it at least half full. I owned another small crock pot and it heated very high on low and had hot spots and burned the food.
customer_reviews.author: exacto67

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for what I wanted it for. I had a big crock pot but wanted something smaller for appetizers or to keep the BBQ sauce warm and stuff like that. This is just the right size. I also like the handle thingy, which makes it easy to tote this to a potluck or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for two.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cooker. We are using it often and it is consistently excellent.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for making steel cut oatmeal overnight
customer_reviews.text: This oval slow cooker is replacing my old round slow cooker that finally fell apart. It's perfect for making steel cut oatmeal overnight. However, there are some hot spots so I had to adjust times and settings a bit to get it just right.
customer_reviews.author: D P Fong

customer_reviews.title: Super Bowl party is coming up soon
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small cooker that I could use for steel cut oatmeal, to be ready in the morning. I make enough for 3 or 4 days, and divide the oatmeal into separate bowls for quick reheat in the microwave oven. I found I need to increase water so oatmeal would not be dry in the morning (using a 4:1, water:oatmeal, ratio now). Super Bowl party is coming up soon, and I can use it to hold a hot appetizer. Good size for multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Hot enough for meat, but I don't like the lid design
customer_reviews.text: The oval shape is big enough tor a chicken leg or lamb shank. The pot gets hot enough to thoroughly cook meat. I do not like the design of the lid: too may places for bacteria to hide (in the gasket, in the groove for the Phillips screw holding the handle on the lid. And I hope there is no lead in the screw.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for two and like the oval shape also was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: OWN AN RV OR BOAT....BEST LITTLE CROCK POT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Mini Crock Pot, it will fit perfect in my little RV Class B Ford Crossfit!
customer_reviews.author: WilburJay

customer_reviews.title: Cooks okay but don't like the way the cover fit s
customer_reviews.text: Cooks okay but don't like the way the cover fit s , it has a rubber gasket but doesn't seal completly , had a much cheaper model for years that I loved , this doesn't even compare , amd trying a nesco next , hoping the cover fits better !!
customer_reviews.author: eddimae

customer_reviews.title: Removable pot insert
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pot that also has a warming setting. I can put a coupla chicken breasts on low and they will be cooked thru.
customer_reviews.author: Main

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just love this slow cooker. Just the right size cooking for two.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: we love cooking in it, simple and efficient with great tasting meals
customer_reviews.author: Amod Saxena

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Great size for things like Buffalo chicken dip, etc. that you want to keep warm/ hot for a party
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for one or two people household
customer_reviews.text: I bought and took this cooker to my mother who lives alone in Japan. This works well. The chicken cacciatore I made for her turned out delicious. She loves making Daikon radish and Octopus something.
customer_reviews.author: Action Samba

customer_reviews.title: This slow cooker + nacho cheese = perfection
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A small crock pot that can keep dips and sauces at a great temperature without destroying them. Want nacho cheese they way you think you do? This is your crock pot. Want nacho cheese to get dried up, reach 400 degrees and a develop a layer of hard, thick film in top? Get any other crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: Beer-Baron

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I live alone so this is the perfect size for me. Most recipes are adaptable to smaller portions so I have no trouble finding something yummy to cook in it. Love the fact that the that the inside cooking pot is removable for cleaning. I use it two or three times a week for everything from soups to main course to dessert. I did a lot of internet research before choosing this one and I am very glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: great for beans
customer_reviews.text: so far i have cooked two dishes with this and it has performed beautifully..being the only person in my household the size is perfect..this is a replacement ..the old one i had i ruined by overtuffing it - letting it overflow and it gummed up the 'motor'' it was round..i like the oval shape of this model it makes it easier to fill..
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: ... use it for pickling silver jewelry and it works great for my small studio
customer_reviews.text: I use it for pickling silver jewelry and it works great for my small studio. Highly recommended for kitchen jewelers and the like. Can't say anything about actually using it too cook though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Chin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice small slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for 2 people or for appetizers. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy W

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for two!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I travel often and we use this with home prepared frozen meals. On occasion I overestimate the amount of food that can be held. Cooking for two takes a little adjustment after cooking for a large family. Nice little crockpot.
customer_reviews.author: BizzyLizzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great!! I'm the only one in the house and it's a perfect size!!
customer_reviews.author: K. C. GATLIN

customer_reviews.title: homemade meals at work
customer_reviews.text: Best slow cooker Small enough to cook a nice size meal The control knob with different temp. settings not usually found in small size slow cookers the unique feature with the large heavy duty rubber band to hold the lid it's an awesome idea and very easy to clean I've taken it to work and cook a meal for my lunch so I had a homemade stew cooked for me right there while I was working And the last thing I will mention is that you getting something worthy for your money I know I did : )
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Small and good
customer_reviews.text: It makes my oatmeal. I have never made anything else in it. It is the perfect size for my steel cut oatmeal that's ready for my breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: tomtom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two (or 1 with leftovers)
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other positive reviews about this slow cooker. The reviews helped me make the decision on buying this and I'm glad I did. It's a perfect size for two, or one with leftovers. It doesn't take up much counter space, doesn't weigh a ton and has all of the settings available in a large cooker. The oval shape is great too. Good purchase for reasonable price. Love the free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Lucybella

customer_reviews.title: In love with it!
customer_reviews.text: I live alone and want to cook in small batches. I have two of these and sometimes have both going at the same time. Have even baked the small bag mixes of muffins and cornbread in them. Really love them and both parts can go into the dishwasher. All small ones cannot!
customer_reviews.author: C. Nix

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Just the perfect size to cook up the four meatballs in a sauce
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: I have just used product for the first run with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have just used product for the first run with following results, ceramic cracked! I just threw the ceramic away. Do I endorse this product, NO.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great!  finally a mini crock with some quality
customer_reviews.text: finally a mini crock with quality I use this to make congees and breakfast. I love the warm setting but most of all I love the rubber grip under the lid. most small crocks are so crappy but this one I really like. Now if proctor silex would make there larger pots with the same grip we'd be in business :)
customer_reviews.author: Chef Kris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small batches, travels well
customer_reviews.text: Just like a regular basic crockpot, perfect for a large sweet potato or a pot of beans for 2-4 people. I like the rubber strap that keeps the lid on tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Columbus Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for traveling or for at home to heat up appetizer dips. The lid stays on tight with the rubber thing that comes with it. Has warm setting in addition to high, low & off which is really convenient so the food inside stays warm without getting burnt.
customer_reviews.author: FarmerJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size & Shape - Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and size, it's really cute. Works fine and easy to clean. The oval is nicer than the round for making meatloaf or a whole chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Q

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a single's household.
customer_reviews.text: I am single and this is the perfect size to make a small meal on a Sunday and have left overs for Monday and Tuesday. I buy roasts and cut them in half and freeze them to thaw them for a meal for one person. This is great! I loved it so much I got one for my mother for Mother's Day.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Essential for cooking steel cut oats
customer_reviews.text: One cup steel cut oats in four cups of water, set cooker to 'low' before you go to bed and you have great oat meal in the morning. I make oats this way at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: G. Michael Gougler

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for cuteness
customer_reviews.text: Well, this little slow cooker gets five stars for cuteness alone! The oval shape makes a lot of sense for longer food items like chicken breasts or a small pork roast. It has a compact footprint on my limited counter top. Just the right size for supper for myself or to invite a friend. Looking forward to using it during this dash-out-the-door fall season.
customer_reviews.author: BBFrick

customer_reviews.title: good quality but
customer_reviews.text: The reason this is so cheap is that it does not have a timer, it just turns on until you turn it off. I got this for oatmeal only, but my other slow cooker that is big has a timer and that function is just so important!
customer_reviews.author: #1Docmom

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Did not cook throughly. Had to finish cooking the meal on top of the stove. Probably fine for dips etc, but not a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Twombly

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I live alone and this is perfect for1 or 2
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little crock pot
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little crock pot! It's just the right size for my daughter and myself and packs all the power I need it to. Perfect size for 1-2 person versions of all my favorite crock pot recipes, and with the sealed lid&strap it travels without leaking a single drop. So in love with this appliance!
customer_reviews.author: Mad Mae

customer_reviews.title: My green beans came out perfectly after cooking for most of the day and I like the fact that the dips don't burn while on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this small crockpot quite a few times now and am really enjoying it. I needed a smaller crockpot to cook dips and smaller portioned foods in. My green beans came out perfectly after cooking for most of the day and I like the fact that the dips don't burn while on the "warm" setting. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Shew

customer_reviews.title: Works well. A bit hot for overnight oatmeal, ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. A bit hot for overnight oatmeal, but we are working on the proportions to get that right.
customer_reviews.author: Art Welling

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size for one or two people
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for one or two people, or making a small amount. I love the removable crock, to put in the dishwasher. It has low, medium, and high settings, nice glass lid, and small enough to put almost anywhere. I am sorry I have not bought one sooner, although I already do have a 4Qt.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Eck

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for 1 or 2 person dinner. Seems well made. Heat is adjustable. Has clear lid. Doesn't take up much room. Easy to clean. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Herb from WA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for brining to a class potluck which is what ...
customer_reviews.text: Small but very compact and heats quickly! Perfect for brining to a class potluck which is what I did. Love that I have a cute little crockpot for making dishes for 2 at home. Would not be big enough to feed more people.
customer_reviews.author: Deepa R.

customer_reviews.title: it will be just perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for a single person, who enjoys cooking but wanted something for small meals. I hope she enjoys it, it will be just perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Simple Meal Maker
customer_reviews.text: Busy two person meal maker. Works better in 24 than 12 hours. Eating Black Beans every week......
customer_reviews.author: F.  Stoneback

customer_reviews.title: I use it for steel cut oatmeal and it turns out nice and creamy
customer_reviews.text: Live this little crock pot! I use it for steel cut oatmeal and it turns out nice and creamy! I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 1 or2!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for one or two people! I've pretty much retired my larger ones. I'm only cooking for one now. Works just like its larger counterparts.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: Love the petite size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little slow cooker for making overnight steel oats. Easy to clean with the removable insert.
customer_reviews.author: Kat can knit

customer_reviews.title: Handy Small Size for Motel!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just the right size for working out of town for motels on the road and coming to room for home cooked warm ready to eat feast.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bottle warming for my twins!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for bottle warming for my twins because regular bottle warmers don't hold 2 bottles. 2 bottles fit perfectly in this crock pot and I can leave it on the counter on low at all times and it's always ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a big slow-cooker, but when it's just me or just lunch or something this is wonderful, and so cute. Just big enough for 1 pork chop or 1 chicken breast, and it's a chinch to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Great for one person!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small slow cooker for one. It works great. I use at least once every week. One meal will last for 2/3 days. Meat is so tender it falls apart....either 4 hour high, or all day slow. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Howry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 1 or 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for 1 or 2 people. I put 4 huge pork chops in it. It was pretty full but still cooked them completely. I love the rubber ring on the lid and the strap to keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Right Size
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely just the right size for the two of us. Love the oval shape - have had round ones prior to this one and it seems like it holds ingredients much better. Also the insulating gasket on the lid is super, no more rattling and jiggleing when cooking. Really works for us!
customer_reviews.author: Edie

customer_reviews.title: Finally! a perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for just me! I hated the big one I had, so cumbersome and not what I needed. This is a perfect size for singles or a couple.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good size cooking vessel for a busy family.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a growing family. Small enough, but not too small.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cabot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small meals
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for small meals! Works well. I have another brand that is the same size, but it cooks too hot even on low. This one the temp is true and the rubber edge on the lid is nice. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: docmacgyver

customer_reviews.title: this was perfect for it (for HUSKY tailgating)
customer_reviews.text: a friend gave me a cheese dip recipe, this was perfect for it (for HUSKY tailgating)
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

product_meta.title: Proctor Silex 33116Y Portable Oval Slow Cooker, 1.5-Quart
product_meta.description: The proctor silex 1.5-Quart portable slow cooker is the perfect size for appetizers and dips that need to be kept warm. the gasket lid and lid latch strap makes for easier travel with less spills. the removable stoneware is dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.
feature_bullets: Lid with rubber seal and Lid Latch strap for spill-resistant travel
Removable oval stoneware & lid are dishwasher safe
Keep warm setting keeps food at serving temperature without overcooking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars696 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
